text: The Russia national badminton team represents Russia in international badminton competitions. The team is organized by the National Badminton Federation of Russia (NFBR) located in Moscow. (The NFBR became the sport's sole administrator when the Russian Badminton Federation (RBF) was dissolved by the Russian Olympic Committee (ROC) in 2005."Letter from the Vice-President of the International Badminton Federation", National Badminton Federation of Russia, 1 November 2005 ==Record== {|class="wikitable" ! !colspan="3"|Badminton Europe !colspan="3"|Badminton World Federation |- ! !Mixed !Men !Women !Thomas Cup !Uber Cup !Sudirman Cup |- !2020 |align="center" |align="center" style="background-color:#cd7f32;"|3rd |align="center"|5/8 |align="center"|Withdrew |align="center"|Withdrew |align="center" |- !2019 |align="center" style="background-color:#cd7f32;"|3rd |align="center" |align="center" |align="center" |align="center" |align="left"|9/12 |- !2018 |align="center" |align="center"|5/8 |align="center" style="background-color:#cd7f32;"|3rd |align="center"|GS |align="center"|GS |align="center" |- !2017 |align="center" style="background- color:silver;"|2nd |align="center" |align="center" |align="center" |align="center" |align="left"|9/12 |- !2016 |align="center" |align="center"|5/8 |align="center"|5/8 |align="center"|DNQ |align="center"|DNQ |align="center" |- !2015 |align="center" style="background-color:#cd7f32;"|3rd |align="center" |align="center" |align="center" |align="center" |align="left"|9/12 |- !2014 |align="center" |align="center"|5/8 |align="center" style="background-color:silver;"|2nd |align="center"|GS |align="center"|GS |align="center" |- !2013 |align="center" style="background-color:#cd7f32;"|3rd |align="center" |align="center" |align="center" |align="center" |align="left"|13th -
